summary: BuildRequest specifies no requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff introduces a new Transfer page and route, sidebar navigation updates, and backend account/transfer logic changes (plus other frontend hook/theme/auth-related updates referenced in summaries). With no requested requirements, these changes appear to be unrequested feature additions.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new money transfer UI page with form validation, balance checks, and toast notifications.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, so adding a transfer feature is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a protected /transfer route and wired TransferPage into the app router.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated the sidebar navigation to include a 'Transfer Money' item (and shows a broad, multi-page nav structure).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented/modified backend account initialization behavior (auto-generating customerId/accountNumber, initial balance logic) and added/modified a transfer API with authorization checks.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest.
